text: It turns out, that stealing does not pay of.Or at least, not if you are 8 and trying to steal from an adult.
And to to this - cats are very unrealiable companions when it comes to troubles.
Adam's dream was crushed very fast and quite violenty by very stern lecturing.
That is how Adam's dream ends.
Or is there a more to all this?
Dare you try to find out?
